text:
FUCK YES ODENKIRK WICK.
This is my kind of action flick, equal parts fun, fresh, fucked up, funny and just the right amount of heart. Ilya KILLS it and Odenkirk is clearly having the time of his life. 
Wonderfully shot, edited like a razors edge (EVERLY’s Evan Schiff!), great music choices. 
So glad I saw this in the theater to hear people cheering. 
Also: Christopher Lloyd and RZA is the spin-off we need ASAP.
